item.title: Changeset [39d95fb]: Fixed #24092 -- Widened base field support for ArrayField. Several ...
item.dc:creator: Tim Graham <timograham@…>
item.description:
Fixed #24092 -- Widened base field support for ArrayField.

Several issues resolved here, following from a report that a base_field of GenericIpAddressField was failing.

We were using get_prep_value instead of get_db_prep_value in ArrayField which was bypassing any extra modifications to the value being made in the base field's get_db_prep_value. Changing this broke datetime support, so the postgres backend has gained the relevant operation methods to send dates/times/datetimes directly to the db backend instead of casting them to strings. Similarly, a new database feature has been added allowing the uuid to be passed directly to the backend, as we do with timedeltas.

On the other side, psycopg2 expects an Inet() instance for IP address fields, so we add a value_to_db_ipaddress method to wrap the strings on postgres. We also have to manually add a database adapter to psycopg2, as we do not wish to use the built in adapter which would turn everything into Inet() instances.

Thanks to smclenithan for the report.

item.description:
Fixed #24124 (again) -- Updated tests with new default context_processors.

Thanks Collin for the review.

item.title: Changeset [511a53b]: Avoided exceptions in admindocs' template detail view. This is ...
item.dc:creator: Aymeric Augustin <aymeric.augustin@…>
item.description:
Avoided exceptions in admindocs' template detail view.

This is marginally better than crashing when several Django template engines are configured in a project.

Refs #24125.

item.title: Changeset [3bba4b42]: Avoided exceptions in a non-critical check in the admin. This change ...
item.dc:creator: Aymeric Augustin <aymeric.augustin@…>
item.description:
Avoided exceptions in a non-critical check in the admin.

This change makes it possible to configure several Django template engines in a project and still use the admin. On the flip side the check is silently skipped when no Django template engine is configured.

item.title: Changeset [6b5113ec]: Made debug views not crash when there isn't a default template engine.
item.dc:creator: Aymeric Augustin <aymeric.augustin@…>
item.description: Made debug views not crash when there isn't a default template engine.

item.title: Changeset [79deb6a0]: Accounted for multiple template engines in template responses.
item.dc:creator: Aymeric Augustin <aymeric.augustin@…>
item.description: Accounted for multiple template engines in template responses.

item.title: Changeset [a3e783fe]: Deprecated passing a Context to a generic Template.render. A ...
item.dc:creator: Aymeric Augustin <aymeric.augustin@…>
item.description:
Deprecated passing a Context to a generic Template.render.

A deprecation path is required because the return type of django.template.loader.get_template changed during the multiple template engines refactor.

test_csrf_token_in_404 was incorrect: it tested the case when the hardcoded template was rendered, and that template doesn't depend on the CSRF token. This commit makes it test the case when a custom template is rendered.

item.title: Changeset [71b7668]: Rewrapped TemplateSyntaxError in Jinja2 backend. Changed import style ...
item.dc:creator: Aymeric Augustin <aymeric.augustin@…>
item.description:
Rewrapped TemplateSyntaxError in Jinja2 backend.

Changed import style to avoid confusion between Django's and Jinja2's APIs.

item.dc:creator: Tim Graham <timograham@…>
item.description: Fixed #9893 -- Allowed using a field's max_length in the Storage.

item.title: Changeset [b5c1a85]: Fixed #24118 -- Added --debug-sql option for tests. Added a ...
item.dc:creator: Marc Tamlyn <marc.tamlyn@…>
item.description:
Fixed #24118 -- Added --debug-sql option for tests.

Added a --debug-sql option for tests and runtests.py which outputs the SQL logger for failing tests. When combined with --verbosity=2, it also outputs the SQL for passing tests.

Thanks to Berker, Tim, Markus, Shai, Josh and Anssi for review and discussion.

item.title: Changeset [68a439a]: Removed supports_binary_field flag as all backends support them It ...
item.dc:creator: Claude Paroz <claude@…>
item.description:
Removed supports_binary_field flag as all backends support them

It was mainly for MySQL on Python 3, but now the current recommended MySQL driver for Python 3 (mysqlclient) does support binary fields, it is unneeded. Refs #20377.

item.title: Changeset [d563e3b]: Fixed #23913 -- Deprecated the `=` comparison in `if` template tag.
item.dc:creator: Tim Graham <timograham@…>
item.description: Fixed #23913 -- Deprecated the = comparison in if template tag.

item.title: Changeset [412066e7]: Revert "Marked a test as an expected failure on MySQL and Python 3.2." ...
item.dc:creator: Claude Paroz <claude@…>
item.description:
Revert "Marked a test as an expected failure on MySQL and Python 3.2."

This reverts commit 832b4a5722ba6b55e7b17c3bac6614ecca9aa88d. We officially don't support MySQL on Python 3.2. Refs #20380.

item.title: Changeset [28de5cd]: Fixed spelling errors in docs.

item.description: Fixed spelling errors in docs.
